events.name: Raising Canes and Outdoor Games
events.description: Come to Briggs Field C for Cane's chicken, spikeball, soccer, ultimate, football, and more! Veg options available.

events.name: Sushi and Poker
events.description: Come join the brothers of ZBT for our signature poker night! We'll serve sushi and give out over $1000 in prizes, including airpods, a drone, speakers, and more. All skill levels welcome; we'll teach you how to play.

events.name: Brunch with the Brothers
events.description: Start your day strong with a custom pancake stack while chatting with the brothers of ZBT! Come meet us, chill, and enjoy a full pancake bar with an extensive array of tppings.

events.name: Sky Zone
events.description: Jump, flip, and fly with ZBT at Sky Zone! Meet at Maseeh or call us for a ride.

events.name: Thai Food and House Tours
events.description: Meet the brothers, tour the ZBT house, and enjoy some of Boston's best thai food! Meet at the bus stop in front of Maseeh or call us for a ride.

events.name: Mini Golf
events.description: Putt your way to a great time with the brothers of ZBT! Meet at the bus stop in front of Maseeh or call us for a ride. Transportation will be provided from Thai dinner.

events.name: Go Karting
events.description: Join the brothers of ZBT for our rendition of Fast and Furious! Meet at the bus stop in front of Maseeh or call us for a ride.

events.name: Bowling, Arcade, and Diner Food
events.description: Have some spare time? Hungry? Whether you strike it lucky or end up in the gutter, bowling with the brothers of ZBT will be a great time. Meet at the bus stop in front of Maseeh or call us for a ride. Transportation from go-karting will be provided.

events.name: Late Night IHOP
events.description: Up late? Join ZBT in eating Americaâ€™s best pancakes at a late-night run to IHOP. Meet at the bus stop in front of Maseeh or call us for a ride. Transportation from bowling will be provided.

events.name: Rock Climbing
events.description: Climb new heights with the brothers of ZBT!

events.name: Sunset Kayaking
events.description: Grab a paddle and row around with the brothers of ZBT!

events.name: Mediterranean Dinner
events.description: Join ZBT for a chill night of Mediterranean eats and good company!

events.name: Winner Winner [Korean Fried] Chicken Dinner
events.description: Come join ZBT for some delicious bonchon chicken and good times. Veg options available.

events.name: Level 99
events.description: A night of mental puzzles, physical challenges, and crushing your friends in competitions!

events.name: Sunset Boat Cruise
events.description: Enjoy a sunset boat cruise over the Charles River! Food will be provided.
